t: For the choir director. Of David. To bring remembrance.
God,*pn hurry to rescue me. Lord,*sln hurry to help me!
Let*pn those who seek to kill me be*ln disgraced and confounded; let*ln those who wish me harm be*ln turned back and humiliated.
Let*ln those who say, “Aha, aha!” retreat*ln because of their shame.
Let*pn all who seek you rejoice and be glad in you; let*ln those who love your salvation continually*ln say, “God is great!”
I*ln am oppressed and needy; hurry*ln to me, God. You*ln are my help and my deliverer; Lord,*sln do not delay.
